name: Health Care Service Management
description: Developed a secure RESTful API using Spring Boot with JWT-based authentication for user login, patient management, and appointment scheduling.

name: Audio Pitch Changer
description: Developed a web-based audio processing tool that allows users to upload audio files and adjust pitch dynamically without affecting playback speed

name: YouTube Downloader
description: Its an android app which is created to convert youTube link to downloadable .mp4 and .mp3 file.These downloads file automatically saved in device's download folder and share it anywhere.
